body:
By request of a colleague @sphamil trying to get Scotch working with trilinos and hitting a conflict between its vendored METIS version and an actual external METIS. Another good use case for https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/23616 .

I did verify that no metis/parmetis symbols or headers are installed.

CC @BerengerBerthoul @olesenm
title: scotch: default to not installing vendored metis/parmetis
